    • Method Detail

      • comparePasswords

        public static void comparePasswords(java.lang.String password,
                                    java.lang.String passwordConfirm)
                             throws UnmatchedException
        This method compares two passwords that it accepts as arguments to determine if they are equal.
        Parameters:
        password - The reference password to be compared.
        passwordConfirm - The password to compare to the reference password.
        Throws:
        UnmatchedException - The exception thrown if the passwords do not match.

      • comparePasswordsWithReturn

        public static boolean comparePasswordsWithReturn(java.lang.String password,
                                                 java.lang.String passwordConfirm)
        This method compares two passwords that it accepts as arguments to determine if they are equal. If the passwords are equal, it returns true and if they differ, it returns false.
        Parameters:
        password - The reference password to be compared.
        passwordConfirm - The password to compare the reference password to.
        Returns:
        True if the passwords are equal and false is the passwords are different.

      • getInvalidPasswords

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getInvalidPasswords(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> passwords)
        This method accepts an arraylist of passwords as an argument, identifies each invalid password, and returns an arraylist containing each invalid password and the corresponding exception message for each invalid password.
        Parameters:
        passwords - The arraylist of passwords to be examined.
        Returns:
        The arraylist of invalid passwords and exception messages that each password caused.

      • hasBetweenSixAndNineChars

        public static boolean hasBetweenSixAndNineChars(java.lang.String password)
        This method accepts a password String argument and checks whether the password supplied is between 6 and 9 characters (inclusive).
        Parameters:
        password - The password whose length is examined.
        Returns:
        True if the password is between 6 and 9 characters long and false otherwise.

      • hasDigit

        public static boolean hasDigit(java.lang.String password)
                        throws NoDigitException
        This method accepts a password String as an argument and determines whether the password supplied contains a digit.
        Parameters:
        password - The password to be analyzed.
        Returns:
        True if the password contains a digit and false otherwise.
        Throws:
        NoDigitException

      • hasLowerAlpha

        public static boolean hasLowerAlpha(java.lang.String password)
                             throws NoLowerAlphaException
        This method accepts a password String as an argument and determines whether the password has a lowercase letter or not.
        Parameters:
        password - The password to be checked.
        Returns:
        True if the password contains a lowercase letter and false otherwise.
        Throws:
        NoLowerAlphaException - The exception thrown if the password doesn't contain a lowercase letter.

        This method accepts a password String as an argument and determines whether the password has a uppercase letter or not.

        Returns:
        True if the password contains an uppercase letter and false otherwise.
        Throws:

      • hasSameCharInSequence

        public static boolean hasSameCharInSequence(java.lang.String password)
                                     throws InvalidSequenceException
        This method accepts a password String as an argument and determines whether the password contains the same character 3 or more times in a row.
        Parameters:
        password - The password to be checked.
        Returns:
        True if the password contains the same character 3 or more times in a row.
        Throws:
        InvalidSequenceException - The exception thrown when the password does contain the same character in a sequence of 3 or more characters.

      • hasSpecialChar

        public static boolean hasSpecialChar(java.lang.String password)
                              throws NoSpecialCharacterException
        This method accepts a password String as an argument and determines whether the password contains a special character.
        Parameters:
        password - The password to be checked.
        Returns:
        True if the password does contain a special character and false otherwise.
        Throws:
        NoSpecialCharacterException - The exception thrown if the password doesn't contain a special character.

      • isValidLength

        public static boolean isValidLength(java.lang.String password)
                             throws LengthException
        This method accepts a password String as an argument and determines whether the password length is greater than or equal to 6 characters.
        Parameters:
        password - The password to be checked.
        Returns:
        True if the password's length is 6 characters or more and false otherwise.
        Throws:
        LengthException - The exception thrown if the password is less than 6 characters long.

      • isValidPassword

        public static boolean isValidPassword(java.lang.String password)
                               throws LengthException,
                                      NoUpperAlphaException,
                                      NoLowerAlphaException,
                                      NoDigitException,
                                      NoSpecialCharacterException,
                                      InvalidSequenceException
        This method accepts a password String as an argument and determines if the password is valid by calling a set of methods defined in this class and passing the password as an argument to each method.
        Parameters:
        password - The password to be checked.
        Returns:
        True if the password is valid and false otherwise.
        Throws:
        LengthException - Exception thrown if the password is less than 6 characters long.
        NoUpperAlphaException - Exception thrown if the password doesn't contain a uppercase letter.
        NoLowerAlphaException - Exception thrown if the password doesn't contain a lowercase character.
        NoDigitException - Exception thrown if the password doesn't contain a digit.
        NoSpecialCharacterException - Exception thrown if the password doesn't contain a special character.
        InvalidSequenceException - Exception thrown if the password contains an invalid sequence.

      • isWeakPassword

        public static boolean isWeakPassword(java.lang.String password)
                              throws WeakPasswordException
        This method accepts a password String as an argument and determines if the password is valid and if the password is weak (i.e. less than or equal to 9 characters long).
        Parameters:
        password - The password to be checked.
        Returns:
        True if the password is weak and false otherwise.
        Throws:
        WeakPasswordException - Exception thrown if the password is weak.
